entry.title: Cisco ISE RCE and Authorization Bypass Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco ISE RCE and Authorization Bypass Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-20124, CVE-2025-20125

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Cisco ISE 存在远程代码执行（RCE）和授权绕过漏洞，攻击者可以通过发送特制的请求执行任意命令或绕过身份验证。利用这些漏洞需要管理员登录权限。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco ISE

来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE-2025-20124_and_CVE-2025-20125

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • Exploit.py
  • README.md

来源概述

🗒️ How to use

  • cve‑20124 (RCE):

python3 Exploit.py –url https://ise.example.com
–Session your_ISE_Session_Token –DESER-CMD “Touch /TMP /PWWNED”

  • cve‑20125 (authorized bypass):

python3 Exploit.py –url https://ise.example.com
–Session your_ISE_Session_Token –Bbypass

  • ⚠️ Important note
    Both drive require an ISE administrator to log in (the administrator only read is enough)

  • This is only an example; In the actual you need:

The Java utility chain is true to sequentially self -transparent CVE‑201224.

Final score authentication (using assumption/API/V1/Admin/*).

🔍 Reference source
Cisco ADVISORY CVE‑20124 & Cve‑20125 - Receive RCE level & ignore the required authentication.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco ISE RCE and Authorization Bypass

entry.title: A vulnerability was found in UTT 进取 750W up to 50 It has been classified as critical This
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-6098

  • https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md

  • https://github.com/newym/cve/blob/main/utt1.md#poc

  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.312567

  • https://vuldb.com/?id.312567

  • https://vuldb.com/?submit.589437

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q

描述：

A vulnerability was found in UTT 进取 750W up to 5.0. It has been classified as critical. This affects the function strcpy of the file /goform/setSysAdm of the component API. The manipulation of the argument passwd1 leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h6wp-g6vw-fx8q

entry.title: FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-11686

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 版本中的 setup.php 和 change_config.php 文件存在不安全处理，导致远程攻击者可以执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要能够访问这些脚本。

产品厂商： FlexPaper

产品名称： FlexPaper (FlowPaper)

影响版本： 2.3.6

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12369

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 contains a remote code execution caused by insecure handling in setup.php and change_config.php, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires access to these scripts.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://redtimmysec.wordpress.com/2019/03/07/flexpaper-remote-code-execution
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b67f601a7711
  • https://github.com/mpgn/CVE-2018-11686
  • https///github.com:mpgn/CVE-2018-11686.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FlexPaper Remote Code Execution Vulnera

entry.title: OpenNMS Horizon 认证远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： OpenNMS Horizon 认证远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： OpenNMS Horizon存在一个认证远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可以利用该漏洞在认证后执行任意命令。

产品厂商： OpenNMS

产品名称： OpenNMS Horizon

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20306

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Steps to reproduce

How’d you do it?

  1. Use linux/http/opennms_horizon_authenticated_rce
  2. Show payloads returns no results.
  3. Trying to run the exploit with the exploit’s default configured payload (cmd/linux/http/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp) returns an incompatible payload error.

Metasploit version

Framework: 6.4.64-dev
Console : 6.4.64-dev

Additional Information

Information from debug log pasted below

Module/Datastore

Collapse

The database contains the following information:

Collapse

Framework Configuration

wrapped_tablestrue
fully_interactive_shellsfalse
manager_commandsfalse
metasploit_payload_warningstrue
defer_module_loadsfalse
smb_session_typetrue
postgresql_session_typetrue
mysql_session_typetrue
mssql_session_typetrue
ldap_session_typetrue
show_successful_loginsfalse
dnstrue
hierarchical_search_tabletrue
display_module_actiontrue

History

The following commands were ran during the session and before this issue occurred:
